backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a persistent labels store with CRUD operations (add, rename, delete, get, getAll) and a default label initializer; protects the 'all' label from modification or deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features (speech-to-text mic button in NoteModal and client-side Export as Document) with associated file paths, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's role, used as build planning documentation for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including color tokens for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for MyOrganizer Pro PWA; loads two Google Fonts stylesheets (Inter/Poppins/Roboto/Open Sans and an extended set), sets PWA meta tags, and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for MyOrganizer Pro defining app name, display mode, theme colors, orientation, and two icon sizes (192×192 and 512×512).
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first with network fallback strategy for same-origin GET requests, with static asset pre-caching on install and old cache cleanup on activate.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab-based navigation across all app pages, lazy-loading Notes and Records pages, initializing settings and seeding the database on mount, and registering the service worker.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSp: Exports a spinning LoadingSpinner component with three size variants and a PageSkeleton component showing pulsing placeholder blocks for lazy-loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/common/Modal.tsx: Reusable modal dialog component with backdrop blur, slide-up animation, configurable size, Escape-key dismissal, scroll lock, and optional title/close button.
frontend/src/components/common/ToastCont: Fixed-position toast notification container that renders success, error, and info toasts from the toast store with icons, slide-up animation, and dismiss buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/QuoteWidget: A clickable home widget that displays the user's daily quote (text, author, and styling) using the useQuote hook, with a fallback prompt if no quote exists.
frontend/src/components/home/StreakWidge: A clickable home widget showing the user's current check-in streak count, last check-in time, and a today indicator using the useStreak hook.
frontend/src/components/home/TodayRoutin: A clickable home widget that previews up to four items from today's routine profile (determined by day type) using the useRoutines hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component that composes the desktop AppSidebar, a scrollable main content area, and the mobile BottomTabBar around child content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Desktop-only sidebar with app logo, navigation buttons for all main tabs, and a footer attribution link; hidden on mobile via Tailwind.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile-only fixed bottom navigation bar rendering icon+label tab buttons for the five main app sections; hidden on desktop via Tailwind.
frontend/src/components/notes/LabelManag: Modal dialog for managing note labels, supporting create, inline rename, and delete (with a confirmation overlay that bulk-reassigns affected notes before deletion).
frontend/src/components/notes/MultiSelec: Fixed top toolbar shown during multi-select mode in the notes list, displaying the selected count and Archive/Trash action buttons.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteCard.t: Grid card component for a single note that supports long-press selection, custom background color, pin indicator, and context-menu actions (pin, archive, trash) with previews for text, checklist, and image note types.
A modal component for creating and editing notes, supporting text, checklist, and image types with features like color picking, label selection, reminders, speech recognition, and export to doc.
frontend/src/components/notes/QuickAddBa: A collapsible bar component that lets users quickly create a new note by selecting between text, checklist, or image note types.
frontend/src/components/streak/CheckInBu: Displays the current streak count and a button to check in for the day, showing a confirmed state once the user has already checked in.
frontend/src/components/streak/StreakCal: Renders a monthly calendar view highlighting days the user checked in, with navigation between months and a legend showing total check-in days.
frontend/src/db/db.ts: Instantiates and exports a singleton OrganizerDB class that exposes typed Table instances for all app data stores (notes, routines, records, streak, quotes, labels, imageBlobs, settings).
frontend/src/db/idb.ts: A lightweight native IndexedDB wrapper that provides a generic Table class with add, put, get, delete, toArray, count, and clear operations, replacing Dexie.
frontend/src/db/schema.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all database entities including Note, RoutineProfile, Record, StreakData, QuoteData, Label, ImageBlob, and AppSettings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageStorage.ts: A React hook providing saveImage, getImageUrl, and deleteImage callbacks for storing and retrieving image blobs in the IndexedDB imageBlobs table.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabels.ts: Custom hook for managing labels in IndexedDB, providing CRUD operations (create, update, delete) with duplicate/reserved-name guards and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Custom hook for managing notes in IndexedDB, supporting create/update/delete/trash/archive/restore operations, filtering by view, search, and label, and bulk selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all labels and initializing default labels via the backend actor, with IndexedDB used for all other data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuote.ts: Custom hook for managing a motivational quote stored in IndexedDB, supporting save and rotation (shuffle or daily) modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecords.ts: Custom hook for managing records in IndexedDB with CRUD operations, search/date filtering, and JSON export functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutines.ts: Custom hook for managing weekday and weekend routine profiles in IndexedDB, supporting item add/update/delete/reorder and completion toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: Custom hook that locks and unlocks body scroll by toggling CSS styles, preserving the scroll position when unlocked.
Custom React hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech API to provide speech-to-text functionality, exposing start/stop controls, final and interim transcripts, and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreak.ts: Custom React hook that manages a daily check-in streak using IndexedDB via Dexie, handling streak counting, broken streak resets, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including app-specific tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying a live clock, greeting, and dashboard widgets (streak, quote, today's routine) along with a floating action button for quick note creation.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Notes page that provides full note management including search, label filtering, view switching, multi-select bulk actions, note creation/editing via a modal, and label management.
frontend/src/pages/QuotePage.tsx: Quote settings page allowing users to configure a motivational quote's text, author, font, size, color, alignment, background blur, rotation mode, and a custom quote list with live preview.
frontend/src/pages/RecordsPage.tsx: Page component for managing records with search, date filtering, add/edit/delete via modal, and JSON export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RoutinesPage.tsx: Page component for managing weekday/weekend routine items with tabs, drag-and-drop reordering, completion toggling, and add/edit/delete via modal.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for customizing theme, accent color, font family, background image, and handling data export/import/clear with storage usage display.
frontend/src/pages/StreakPage.tsx: Page displaying the user's daily check-in streak with current count, total check-ins, last check-in time, and a calendar history view.
frontend/src/store/appStore.ts: Zustand store managing global app appearance state (theme, accent color, font) with persistence via localStorage utilities and CSS variable application.
frontend/src/store/toastStore.ts: Zustand store for managing toast notifications with auto-dismiss after 3.5 seconds and helper functions for success, error, and info toasts.
frontend/src/utils/dataValidation.ts: Validates imported JSON data by checking for required top-level arrays (notes, routines, records, labels) and returning a result with any errors.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Utility function that formats a date string, number, or Date object into a human-readable '28 Feb 2026, 3:45 AM' format, handling edge cases safely.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Utility functions to compress images to JPEG using a canvas element with configurable max width and quality, plus a thumbnail generator shortcut.
frontend/src/utils/noteExport.ts: Provides a client-side `exportNoteAsDoc` function that converts a Note (text or checklist) into a Word-compatible HTML blob and triggers a browser download with a sanitized, timestamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Exports two utilities: one to request browser notification permission and one to schedule a native browser notification at a specified future timestamp using `setTimeout`.
frontend/src/utils/seedData.ts: Seeds the IndexedDB database with default notes, a log record, streak entry, motivational quotes, and weekday/weekend routines if each respective table is empty.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorkerRegistra: Registers the `/sw.js` service worker on page load if the browser supports it, silently ignoring failures so the app continues to work without a SW.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Provides typed get/set helpers for persisting three UI settings (theme, accent color, font family) in `localStorage` using fixed key constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that enables dark mode via class, registers typography/container-queries/animate plugins, and extends the theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based semantic colors, border radii, and box shadows.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state including version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features such as speech-to-text in NoteModal and client-side DOC export for notes.
